verses.verse: But in the last<WH319> days<WH3117> it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that the mountain<WH2022> of the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> shall be<WH1961> established<WH3559> in the top<WH7218> of the mountains,<WH2022> and it<WH1931> shall be exalted<WH5375> above the hills;<WH4480> <WH1389> and people<WH5971> shall flow<WH5102> unto<WH5921> it.

And many<WH7227> nations<WH1471> shall come,<WH1980> and say,<WH559> Come,<WH1980> and let us go up<WH5927> to<WH413> the mountain<WH2022> of the LORD,<WH3068> and to<WH413> the house<WH1004> of the God<WH430> of Jacob;<WH3290> and he will teach<WH3384> us of his ways,<WH4480> <WH1870> and we will walk<WH1980> in his paths:<WH734> for<WH3588> the law<WH8451> shall go forth<WH3318> of Zion,<WH4480> <WH6726> and the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> from Jerusalem.<WH4480> <WH3389>

And he shall judge<WH8199> among<WH996> many<WH7227> people,<WH5971> and rebuke<WH3198> strong<WH6099> nations<WH1471> afar off;<WH5704> <WH7350> and they shall beat<WH3807> their swords<WH2719> into plowshares,<WH855> and their spears<WH2595> into pruning hooks:<WH4211> nation<WH1471> shall not<WH3808> lift up<WH5375> a sword<WH2719> against<WH413> nation,<WH1471> neither<WH3808> shall they learn<WH3925> war<WH4421> any more.<WH5750>

But they shall sit<WH3427> every man<WH376> under<WH8478> his vine<WH1612> and under<WH8478> his fig tree;<WH8384> and none<WH369> shall make them afraid:<WH2729> for<WH3588> the mouth<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> hath spoken<WH1696> it.

For <WH3588> all<WH3605> people<WH5971> will walk<WH1980> every one<WH376> in the name<WH8034> of his god,<WH430> and we<WH587> will walk<WH1980> in the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> forever<WH5769> and ever.<WH5703>

In that<WH1931> day,<WH3117> saith<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> will I assemble<WH622> her that halteth,<WH6760> and I will gather<WH6908> her that is driven out,<WH5080> and her that<WH834> I have afflicted;<WH7489>

And I will make<WH7760> <WH853> her that halted<WH6760> a remnant,<WH7611> and her that was cast far off<WH1972> a strong<WH6099> nation:<WH1471> and the LORD<WH3068> shall reign<WH4427> over<WH5921> them in mount<WH2022> Zion<WH6726> from henceforth,<WH4480> <WH6258> even forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>

And thou,<WH859> O tower<WH4026> of the flock,<WH5739> the stronghold<WH6076> of the daughter<WH1323> of Zion,<WH6726> unto<WH5704> thee shall it come,<WH857> even the first<WH7223> dominion;<WH4475> the kingdom<WH4467> shall come<WH935> to the daughter<WH1323> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>

Now <WH6258> why<WH4100> dost thou cry out<WH7321> aloud?<WH7452> is there no<WH369> king<WH4428> in thee? is thy counselor<WH3289> perished?<WH6> for<WH3588> pangs<WH2427> have taken<WH2388> thee as a woman in travail.<WH3205>

Be in pain,<WH2342> and labor to bring forth,<WH1518> O daughter<WH1323> of Zion,<WH6726> like a woman in travail:<WH3205> for<WH3588> now<WH6258> shalt thou go forth<WH3318> out of the city,<WH4480> <WH7151> and thou shalt dwell<WH7931> in the field,<WH7704> and thou shalt go<WH935> even to<WH5704> Babylon;<WH894> there<WH8033> shalt thou be delivered;<WH5337> there<WH8033> the LORD<WH3068> shall redeem<WH1350> thee from the hand<WH4480> <WH3709> of thine enemies.<WH341>
Now <WH6258> also many<WH7227> nations<WH1471> are gathered<WH622> against<WH5921> thee, that say,<WH559> Let her be defiled,<WH2610> and let our eye<WH5869> look<WH2372> upon Zion.<WH6726>

But they<WH1992> know<WH3045> not<WH3808> the thoughts<WH4284> of the LORD,<WH3068> neither<WH3808> understand<WH995> they his counsel:<WH6098> for<WH3588> he shall gather<WH6908> them as the sheaves<WH5995> into the floor.<WH1637>

Arise <WH6965> and thresh,<WH1758> O daughter<WH1323> of Zion:<WH6726> for<WH3588> I will make<WH7760> thine horn<WH7161> iron,<WH1270> and I will make<WH7760> thy hooves<WH6541> brass:<WH5154> and thou shalt beat in pieces<WH1854> many<WH7227> people:<WH5971> and I will consecrate<WH2763> their gain<WH1215> unto the LORD,<WH3068> and their substance<WH2428> unto the Lord<WH113> of the whole<WH3605> earth.<WH776>
